links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=3..2000
example: a(3) = nextprime(3) - prevprime(3) = 5 - 2 = 3: This shows that here the variants 2 (A151800 and A151799) of the nextprime and precprime functions are used, rather than the variants A007918 and A007917. - _M. F. Hasler_, Sep 09 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
